body:
When we set multiple services in `service_strategies`, the last one is shown in the response returned by agent for every service queried.

For example, when the sampling strategies file is this: 
```
"default_strategy": {"param": 0.10000000000000001, "type": "ratelimiting"},
    "service_strategies": [{"operation_strategies": [{"operation": "HTTP GET", "param":
    1, "type": "probabilistic"}, {"operation": "HTTP GET - metrics", "param": 0, "type":
    "probabilistic"}], "service": "query-frontend"}, {"operation_strategies": [{"operation":
    "HTTP GET - metrics", "param": 1.0000000000000001e-05, "type": "probabilistic"}],
    "service": "ingester"}]}
```

The response from agent:
```
# wget -qO- http://jaeger-agent.jaeger.svc:5778/sampling?service=query-frontend
{"strategyType":"PROBABILISTIC","probabilisticSampling":{"samplingRate":0.001},"operationSampling":{"defaultSamplingProbability":0.001,"defaultLowerBoundTracesPerSecond":0,"perOperationStrategies":[{"operation":"HTTP GET - metrics","probabilisticSampling":{"samplingRate":0.00001}}]}}
```

When the file is the following:
```
{"default_strategy": {"param": 0.10000000000000001, "type": "ratelimiting"},
    "service_strategies": [{"operation_strategies": [{"operation": "HTTP GET", "param":
    1, "type": "probabilistic"}, {"operation": "HTTP GET - metrics", "param": 0, "type":
    "probabilistic"}], "service": "query-frontend"}, {"operation_strategies": [{"operation":
    "HTTP GET - metrics", "param": 0, "type": "probabilistic"}], "service": "querier"},
    {"operation_strategies": [{"operation": "HTTP GET - metrics", "param": 1.0000000000000001e-05,
    "type": "probabilistic"}], "service": "ingester"}]}
```

The response from agent:
```
# wget -qO- http://jaeger-agent.jaeger.svc:5778/sampling?service=query-frontend
{"strategyType":"PROBABILISTIC","probabilisticSampling":{"samplingRate":0.001},"operationSampling":{"defaultSamplingProbability":0.001,"defaultLowerBoundTracesPerSecond":0,"perOperationStrategies":[{"operation":"HTTP GET - metrics","probabilisticSampling":{"samplingRate":0.00001}}]}}

# wget -qO- http://jaeger-agent.jaeger.svc:5778/sampling?service=querier
{"strategyType":"PROBABILISTIC","probabilisticSampling":{"samplingRate":0.001},"operationSampling":{"defaultSamplingProbability":0.001,"defaultLowerBoundTracesPerSecond":0,"perOperationStrategies":[{"operation":"HTTP GET - metrics","probabilisticSampling":{"samplingRate":0.00001}}]}}
```

This is on `v1.8.0` of jaeger.
title: Multiple service sampling strategies broken
